original_text: Do not carry any loads out of your houses. Do not do any work on a Sabbath day. You must keep the Sabbath day as a special day for me. That is what I commanded your ancestors to do. See Exodus 20:8. Do not carry any loads out of your houses. Do not do any work on a Sabbath day. You must keep the Sabbath day as a special day for me. That is what I commanded your ancestors to do.
korean_text: 안식일에 너희 집에서 짐을 내지 말며 어떤 일이라도 하지 말고 내가 너희 조상들에게 명령함 같이 안식일을 거룩히 할지어다

sentences.original_text: Do not carry any loads out of your houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 집에서 어떤 짐도 들고 나가지 마라.

sentences.original_text: Do not do any work on a Sabbath day.
You must keep the Sabbath day as a special day for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 안식일을 나를 위한 특별한 날로 지켜야 한다.

sentences.original_text: That is what I commanded your ancestors to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 내가 너희 조상들에게 명령한 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Do not carry any loads out of your houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 집에서 어떤 짐도 들고 나가지 마라.

sentences.original_text: Do not do any work on a Sabbath day.
You must keep the Sabbath day as a special day for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 안식일을 나를 위한 특별한 날로 지켜야 한다.

sentences.original_text: That is what I commanded your ancestors to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 내가 너희 조상들에게 명령한 것이다.
